channel.title: E3 2010
channel.description:
Anyone else watching it on G4? If so, what are your opinions so far?
Personally, I was absolutely blown away by Nintendo's press conference. Sony's was pretty epic too, but wasn't as big as Nintendo's. The 3DS looks awesome, and Sony's 3D enabling PS3 update are pretty epic. I also can't wait for Black Ops... Then again, I said the same thing about MW2 :\ Microsoft's press conference wasn't that big for me, and Kinect (Project Natal) doesn't look that impressive, especially when we had the same thing years ago on the PS2.

I’ll pass on the Kinect, but I will be getting the 3DS. Not only for Zelda, but I’m sure there will be a 3D Pokemon somewhere down the line.

3D pokemon will be awesome, I will be getting kinect and my ps3 was stolen so I will get the new one :D.
[/quote]

There was a 3D pokemon years ago anyway on the GameCube, anyone remember Pokemon Colosseum? Twas good.[/quote]

Espeon and Umbreon power?

item.title: E3 2010
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

I just finished watching Microsoft’s press conference. They didn’t focus on Black Ops :p, but they did base half of their press conference around Kinect, which kinda blew. Its just an EyeToy on steroids… The only thing awesome about that press conference was the new redesigned Xbox 360, and the fact that everyone at that press conference got one for free (wtf?). Also this new Xbox 360 is smaller, quieter, sleeker, has a 250 gb hdd, and has built in wireless, and it costs the same as a current Xbox 360 Well, I’ll be going to GameStop in the morning to see how much I can get for mine xD

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2010
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

Nintendo 3ds = win
Call of duty black ops = more win
Halo reach =

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2010
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Ya, it has been a disappointing year for Microsoft, and with only 1 day left, I don’t think they’re going to shock us with anything… I mean ya they have Halo: Reach, and Fable III, but those games are really the only thing other than Kinect that I saw from Microsoft (didn’t catch their full press conference like Sony’s and Nintendo’s but I can’t see anything else in the highlights).

As for the PC though…
I can not wait for Star Wars Old Republic… Anyone else getting that game?

Also:
http://e3.gamespot.com/press-conference/microsoft-e3/
I found Microsoft’s complete press conference… I’ve watched about 3 minutes and I can already tell that COD: Black Ops is Microsoft’s focus this year :\

Edit:
Apparently Microsoft and Activision are shafting everyone who have a PS3 by releasing everything on Xbox first until 2012, and I’m sure this deal will end up going further than that.

Another Edit:
I thought Metal Gear Solid was a PS only franchise… Apparently the next game is on Xbox 360?

Yet another edit:
Apparently we can watch ESPN on our Xbox now. It’s like watching it on Comcast wasn’t good enough…

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2010
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

^^^

dude microsofts gotta get something going for them there really disappointing me right now. kinect isnt half waht i expected after i saw the guy that painted and stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2010
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:7, topic:344494”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=440871.msg3239097#msg3239097 date=1276740984]
I’ll pass on the Kinect, but I will be getting the 3DS. Not only for Zelda, but I’m sure there will be a 3D Pokemon somewhere down the line.
[/quote]
3D pokemon will be awesome, I will be getting kinect and my ps3 was stolen so I will get the new one :D.[/quote]
It’s not a new PS3 3D was enabled in a firmware update, the only thing you would have to buy is a 3D enabled TV (theres a Sony Bravia with that of course) and 3D glasses.

TabbyKiller:

I’m watching bits on Machinima.

http://e3.g4tv.com/e32010/
Much better imo.

ChaosPkers:

ya dude nintendos been kinda quiet for a while there planning big things huh

I forget what his name was, but the one guy at Nintendo’s press conference said “… we at Nintendo have been looking into 3D for quite a long time…” Just imagine how much effort it took them to keep that a secret until now, as well as that game (can’t remember the name) that has sold 4.4 million copies in Japan on the DS… It’s being released in 20 days, and I’m sure no one here has even herd of it until now. Nintendo has basically been playing it low the last few years, and they have really blown, I think, all of us away this year.

I was also shocked at Sony’s pricing on the new PS3 move. I forget what the camera would cost, but the controllers are only $49.99 each, which is roughly what I pay for a Xbox 360 controller. It kinda sucks that Sony and Nintendo can release this technology to us for around $50, while Microsoft’s Kinect is $150 though :\

Read full topic
